moreBlocks.lawyersAtFernandezLawSelectedForASuperLa: • Fernandez, Gonzalo A. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Here at Fernandez Law in St. Louis, Missouri, we provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients across our region who have suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. With more than 30 years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently, and we promise to do all we can to improve the likelihood that you will receive the maximum amount of compensation that you deserve.

Over the course of our history, we have recovered more than $100 million in total compensation for our plaintiff clients who have personal injury or wrongful death claims arising from car and truck accidents, medical malpractice, sexual abuse and other preventable tragedies. Recognized for our success, our attorneys have earned memberships in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum along with consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers.

Among our most notable accolades, our law firm's founder, attorney Gonzalo A. Fernandez, is AV Preeminent peer-review rated,* the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell, as well as designation from America's Top 100 Attorneys. Moreover, we have received "Superb" ratings on Avvo along with the site's Clients' Choice Award, and we have enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

Built on the principles of experience, integrity and results, Fernandez Law offers the best chance you have of achieving the justice you seek for the suffering you and your family have endured. To begin the process, you can contact our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations in an effort to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
